1.title: Musical Hiccups

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Vipo, Henry and Betty fly to Salzburg, Austria when Betty starts hiccuping. Mozart's mice are just one piano note short of a musical masterpiece... can Betty's hiccup help?

2.title: Saving the Empress' Crown

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: The quest continues as Vipo meets the Empress herself, who manages to capture Vipo and doesn't believe his friends will climb all the way up into her wind-high treetop lair to save him. However, Betty, Yoshi, Jimmy and Jenny, Dr. Timmly, and even Mombo the mongoose prove her wrong: they save Vipo, and retrieve the Autumn Stone.

3.title: Betty Kidnapped

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Pigeons in St. Marcus' Square kidnap Betty. The ransom? The best pizza crust in Italy!

4.title: A Trevi Fountain Wish Comes True

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Betty's wish is to be big. Will she be happy when her wish comes true?

5.title: Billy Must Win

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Billy the Bull has to compete against an arrogant matador in a cruel bull fight. Can our brave trio help?

6.title: The Kings of Croissants and Baguettes

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: The King of Croissants and the King of Baguettes are fighting over a beautiful Parisian girl's love. Vipo teaches them all about love.

7.title: The Munich Dog Competition

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Vipo comes to the rescue at the German Museum. Lasso doesn't like the new hero in town and challenges Vipo to a Bavarian style duel.

8.title: The Lost Christmas Gifts

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Santa's sack falls out of his sled and all the Christmas presents go missing. Roger the reindeer are doubting his flying abilities! Can Vipo help?

9.title: Zoo Problems

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: A new born baby seal is to be sent away to the Hong Kong zoo. Can Vipo keep the seal family together?

10.title: The Missing Windmill

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Vipo and friends are visiting Holland, where one of its windmills has vanished! What happened to the windmill? Can Vipo help?

11.title: The Ravens of the London Tower

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: There's no tea left in London! Can Vipo solve the mystery of the missing tea bags?

12.title: A Swiss Skiing Adventure

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: A chocolate machine goes crazy and an entire ski resort is overtaken by chocolate!

13.title: Nessy's Kilt

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: Does monsters really exist? Vipo, Betty and Henry help Blacky the sheep and get to the bottom of this age old mystery.

14.title: The Siberian Tiger Is Hungry

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

14.plot: The Moscow Circus' clowns have a big problem: the Siberian tiger is always hungry and Anatoly the monkey is always annoying! Can Vipo teach Anatoly a lesson and help the hungry tiger?

15.title: The Animal Olympics

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

15.plot: All the animals have gathered for the Olympics in Athens. Dimitris accidentally extinguished the flame and the Games can't start without the Olympic fire...

16.title: The Dog Barber of Seville

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

16.plot: All the dogs in Seville look the same? Vipo teaches the dog barber a special lesson!

17.title: A Pyramid Mystery

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

17.plot: A camel is eager to explore the pyramids, but gets stuck in the narrow passageways underground. Help! A scary, mysterious mummy is roaming around ... Vipo comes to the rescue!

18.title: King Congo

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

18.plot: Betty's stolen skateboard winds up in the hands of King Congo, a huge, conceited gorilla, who treats his fellow animals badly. But with help from Vipo and Betty, Congo learns a lesson about being a good leader.

19.title: The Elephant with Bad Memory

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

19.plot: Anad the elephant's excellent memory doesn't allow him to forget his sad past! Poor Shakira suffers from the opposite problem: she has no memory at all...

20.title: The Koala and the Kangaroo

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

20.plot: The koalas and kangaroos are at war! The neighborhood fight is disturbed by a terrible bush fire - Vipo, Betty and Henry comes to the rescue.

21.title: The Crocodile Who Lost His Teeth

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

21.plot: The bulldozers are threatening to destroy the Amazon rainforests and a strange "tooth monster" is scaring the animals! Oh no! Polly the Parrot has lost her eggs.

22.title: The Maya Treasure Mystery

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

22.plot: Jose the donkey and Manuel the lizard keep hunting for treasures, to get rich. One day they come across a special treasure map. Will they find happiness being rich?

23.title: Uncle Florence

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

23.plot: Some wannabe hip-hop rapper cats scare the squirrels away. Two brave little squirrels searches for their uncle to help them in their plight. Can Vipo help when things go wrong?

24.title: Akiro's Friends

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

24.plot: Hi-tech bunnies attempt to steal from Tokyo's gadget fair and Akiro, the scary bulldog, learns about friendship.

25.title: The Chinese Ninja Test

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

25.plot: Vipo's backpack got mixed up. Instead of Betty, Vipo and Henry are carrying Yao, the Golden Lion Tamarin on a journey to the Shaolin Temple. Can Vipo find Betty, and try to help Yao become a brave ninja?

26.title: Home Sweet Home

episode of.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog (TV Series 2007– )

26.plot: Vipo returns home after his exciting adventures to celebrate his birthday in a special end-of-the-season episode!

imdb.plot outline: Follow Vipo the Flying Dog with his friends Betty (a toy cat) and Henry (a stork) to different destinations, where they meet interesting characters and make new friends. In each exciting adventure, we learn valuable lessons and fascinating facts about the world we live in.
imdb.title: Vipo: Adventures of the Flying Dog
plot: Follow Vipo the Flying Dog with his friends Betty (a toy cat) and Henry (a stork) to different destinations, where they meet interesting characters and make new friends. In each exciting adventure, we learn valuable lessons and fascinating facts about the world we live in.

Vipo is an adorable dog who learns how to fly using his extraordinarily long ears. Together with his friends, Henry the stork and Betty the yellow toy cat, they fly around the world and experience many adventures, meet new friends, and explore new countries, cities and cultures.
